name: 3D Platformer Tutorial (garciaow)
description:
This is my 3D Platformer Submission. Proposed modifications include a new level, new UI, and new platforms with new mechanics.

CREDITS

  • Created by Owen Garcia

NOTE

I apologize for the lack of a webGL option. It would not finish loading even after several attempts with over a half hour for each. This site would not let me upload both the Windows and macOS builds without having something to be played in the browser, so I uploaded a copy of the Windows build for that as a scapegoat. I am aware that it's not going to work; I apologize for the inconvenience.
